name: Remove WP Menu
author: Aaron Holbrook

sections.description: Small plugin to throw in mu-plugins that disables the WP Menu from the WordPress admin bar. I’ve found on some client sites that it poses more of a hindrance to have additional administrative options.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done! The WP Menu in Admin Bar is gone!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done! The WP Menu in Admin Bar is gone!
